rows: Binding an additional feature to an app implies binding the additional feature code and additional feature status for all Creatio users.
Optional. Binding a status of the additional feature to an app implies binding the additional feature status for a Creatio system user or organizational role.
html:
Element to bind

Property value

Binding description

Additional feature

Feature

Binding an additional feature to an app implies binding the additional feature code and additional feature status for all Creatio users.

Status of the additional feature

AdminUnitFeatureState

Optional. Binding a status of the additional feature to an app implies binding the additional feature status for a Creatio system user or organizational role.
